title: Porous carbon/Fe3O4 nanocomposite as a new magnetically recoverable catalyst for the preparation of polyhydroquinolines
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27565-27574
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05432F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hamid Goudarziafshar, Maryam Zafari, Ahmad Reza Moosavi-Zare
A porous carbon/Fe3O4 nanocomposite (PC/Fe3O4 nanocomposite) was prepared through the pyrolysis of peanut shells as biowaste with ferrous ferric oxide to give a new magnetically recoverable catalyst and successfully tested on the synthesis of polyhydroquinolines.
